Profile.text:
I have expertise in front-end development, with solid skills in languages like HTML, Javascript, CSS. Javascript libraries like Jquery, D3, Google maps, and frameworks like Angular and React. I work with agile methodologies like SCRUM and Design Thinking.
Design and start up of digital projects like web applications, animations, tutorials and other multimedia products. In this kind of projects, I have worked on User Experience design (UX), on Interface Design and on the creation of layouts, always aiming for intuitive good user experience applications, and at the same time, thinking in the client’s requirements. I consider myself a person who is always open to changes and to new opportunities, with teamwork skills. Proactive, critical of my own work and always ready to help my coworkers and to accept critics from them.
